test.name: Myfirstcase

kw.name: Set Test Message
kw.doc: Sets message for the current test case.
kw.msg: Set test message to: log in, translate, log out

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text

test.doc: opening the browser, accepting privacy notifications, logging in and out , translating a text

suite.doc: My first case includes opening the browser, accepting privacy notifications, logging into the website account and after that writing the sentence into the translating text area and eventually logging out.
